job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pLeveraging financial information is what Puzzle is all about We are an ambitious startup well funded by a top tier VC with an experienced team who have built multiple successful companies and raised over 500MppbrppWe are solving a true pain point that every company has and keeps having as they growppbrppWe are on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating a culture where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity We know that new ideas can come from anywhere in the organization and the next big idea could be yoursppbrppWhat Are We DoingppbrppStarting a company has become easier but growing a company is more complicated than ever We are building a realtime smarter financial infrastructure to put trustworthy data into the hands of decisionmakersppbrppWe are currently remote but will have a hub in San Francisco But you can work from anywhereppbrppJob DescriptionppbrppAs part of Puzzle you will help design and build our financial data systemppbrppWe will be ingesting large amounts of data from disparate sources transforming them organizing them and correlating them  delivering the core platform for the rest of our productsnbspnbspppbrppWe expect the data to be large dirty and difficult to wrangleppbrppWe want to be as real time as possible event driven and decoupled Redundant resistant and securenbspAnd accuracy is keyppbrppThis is your opportunity to be an early engineer at a well funded startup that has a successful founder and a drive to change how companys leverage their financials We are remote first so anywhere in North America works for usppbrppWhat Youll DoppbrpulliScale out our core ingestion platformliliCreate unique functionality for correlation of dataliliDesign interfaces and apis to our dataliliExtend and architect our event pipeline for speed and scaleliliExtend our core reporting platformliliWork on designing endpoints for our productliliHandle an ever growing stream of dataliliAnything else that comes alongliulpbrppWhat You Need To SucceedppbrpulliBSMS in Computer Science a related field or equivalent work experiencelili4 years as a professional software engineerliliExperience developing largescale data intensive applications ideally using technologies like Node Python PubSub Kafka Kinesis ElasticSearchliliExperience maintaining highly available faulttolerant and distributed services including familiarity with technologies microservices managed services GCP DockerliliExperience with the design of and integration with APIs and web services such as REST APIs and GraphQLliliExperience with agile software development methodologiesliliExperience with financial systems is a big plusliliExperience with security is a big plusliulpbrppDesired SkillspulliPractical experience in developing applications using microservices container technologies container management systems such as Docker Kubernetes etcliliStrong experience with Databases design SQL NoSQL and analyticsliliPrior working experience in utility computing andor cloud computing domain highly desiredliliExperience building and deploying applications and services into cloud environments GCP highly desiredliulpbrppPuzzle is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of gender race or color ethnicity or national origin age disability religion sexual orientation gender identity or expression veteran status or any other characteristics protected by lawp
